remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成的所有内容写入到的流对象作为传递后`stream`参数。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the stream object passed as the `stream` parameter.

summary.span: 采用异步操作将 HTTP 内容序列化到内存流。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory stream as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成的所有内容都已写入内存流。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the memory stream. 操作完成后，返回的任务对象上的属性包含内存流，表示将 HTTP 内容。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the memory stream that that represents the HTTP content. 然后可以使用返回的流读取使用多个流 Api 的内容。The returned stream can then be used to read the content using various stream APIs. 方法缓冲到内存流的内容。The method buffers the content to a memory stream. 如果没有更好的方法来检索的内容以流的形式，派生的类可以重写此行为。Derived classes can override this behavior if there is a better way to retrieve the content as stream. 例如，一个字节数组或一个字符串，可以使用更高效的方法方法，例如 wrapping 只读的字节或字符串周围。)For example, a byte array or a string could use a more efficient method way such as wrapping a read-only around the bytes or string.)

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，并可根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；如果仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，并可根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

summary.span: 以异步操作方式将 HTTP 内容序列化到内存缓冲区。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoadIntoBufferAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 以异步操作方式将 HTTP 内容序列化到内存缓冲区。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成后的所有内容已序列化到内存缓冲区。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the memory buffer. 内容序列化为内存缓冲区后，会调用到其中一个方法会将内存缓冲区的内容复制到目标流。After content is serialized to a memory buffer, calls to one of the methods will copy the content of the memory buffer to the target stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoadIntoBufferAsync(int64 maxBufferSize) cil managed
Public Function LoadIntoBufferAsync (maxBufferSize As Long) As Task

param.name: maxBufferSize
param.span: 要使用的缓冲区最大大小。（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer to use.

summary.span: 以异步操作方式将 HTTP 内容序列化到内存缓冲区。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成后的所有内容已序列化到内存缓冲区。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the memory buffer. 内容序列化为内存缓冲区后，会调用到其中一个方法会将内存缓冲区的内容复制到目标流。After content is serialized to a memory buffer, calls to one of the methods will copy the content of the memory buffer to the target stream. 如果内容超出了中传递的值`maxBufferSize`参数，将引发异常。If the content exceeds the value passed in the `maxBufferSize` parameter , an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<unsigned int8[]> ReadAsByteArrayAsync() cil managed
Public Function ReadAsByteArrayAsync () As Task(Of Byte())

summary.span: 将 HTTP 内容序列化到字节数组，此为异步操作。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a byte array as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成的所有内容作为字节数组写入后。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written as a byte array. 操作完成后，返回的任务对象上的属性包含与 HTTP 内容的字节数组。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the byte array with the HTTP content.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.IO.Stream> ReadAsStreamAsync() cil managed
Public Function ReadAsStreamAsync () As Task(Of Stream)

summary.span: 将 HTTP 内容序列化并返回将内容表示为异步操作的流。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content and return a stream that represents the content as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成所有流之后，已读取表示内容。The returned object will complete after all of the stream that represents content has been read. 操作完成后，返回的任务对象上属性包含表示将 HTTP 内容的流。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the stream that that represents the HTTP content. 然后可以使用返回的流读取使用多个流 Api 的内容。The returned stream can then be used to read the content using various stream APIs.

summary.span: 将 HTTP 内容序列化到字符串，此为异步操作。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a string as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成后的所有内容已编写为字符串。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written as a string. 操作完成后，返回的任务对象上的属性包含与 HTTP 内容的字符串。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the string with the HTTP content.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract bool TryComputeLength (out long length);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryComputeLength([out] int64& length) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Function TryComputeLength (ByRef length As Long) As Boolean
protected public: abstract bool TryComputeLength([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] long % length);

param.name: length
param.span: HTTP 内容的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length in bytes of the HTTP content.

summary.span: 确定 HTTP 内容是否具有有效的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Determines whether the HTTP content has a valid length in bytes.

returns.span: 如果 是有效长度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is a valid length; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使 HTTP 内容能够计算内容的长度。The method gives a HTTP content the ability to calculate the content length. 这是适用于内容类型能够轻松地计算出的内容长度。This is useful for content types which are able to easily calculate the content length. 如果计算的内容长度不能或者成本高昂 （且需要系统的数据进行缓冲整个内容序列化将可能产生巨额开销或需要分配大量内存的系统位置），此方法可以返回`false`。If computing the content length is not possible or expensive (would require the system to buffer the whole content where the serialization would be expensive or require the system to allocate a lot of memory), this method can return `false`. 如果此方法返回`false`，这意味着的所需 chunked 的传输或发送到服务器之前，必须获取缓冲内容。If this method returns `false`, this implies that either chunked transfer is needed or the content must get buffered before being sent to the server.
